        private void moveSpell(Spell spell,
                       ICoordinate newCoordinatesForTheSpell,
                       Direction currentDirection)
        This method is used to move the spell. Because the spell move in a very different way than others components, we use a different method than moveComponent().
        Parameters:
        spell - the spell to move
        newCoordinatesForTheSpell - the future coordinates of the spell
        currentDirection - the current direction of the spell
